that may     need to create a new week.","params":{"_amountApprove":"Amount to approve or initialize the week with.","_contractId":"ID of the contract for which the approval is happening.","_initializeNewWeek":"If true, will initialize a new week if the specified weekId doesn't exist.","_receiver":"Address of the contractor receiving the approved amount.","_weekId":"ID of the week within the contract to be approved, or creates a new one if it does not exist."}},"approve(uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"This function allows the client to approve a deposit, the approved amount.","_weekId":"ID of the week within the contract to be approved."}},"approveReturn(uint256)":{"details":"This changes the status of the deposit to allow the client to withdraw their funds.","params":{"_contractId":"ID of the deposit for which the return is approved."}},"cancelReturn(uint256,uint8)":{"details":"Allows reverting the contract status from RETURN_REQUESTED to an or COMPLETED."}},"claim(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function allows the contractor to claim the approved amount from the deposit.","params":{"_contractId":"ID of the deposit from which to claim funds.","_weekId":"ID of the week within the contract to be claimed."}},"claimAll(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function is designed to prevent running out of gas when claiming multiple which to begin claims."}},"createDispute(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Initiates a dispute status for a contract that can be activated by the client or contractor     when they disagree on the previously submitted work.","params":{"_contractId":"ID of the contract where the dispute occurred.","_weekId":"ID of the contract where the dispute occurred. This function can only be called if the contract status is either RETURN_REQUESTED or SUBMITTED."}},"deposit(uint256,(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8))":{"details":"This function handles the initialization or update of a week's deposit in a single transaction.      If a new contract ID is provided, a new contract is initialized; otherwise, it adds to an existing contract.","params":{"_contractId":"ID of the contract for which the deposit is made; if zero, a new contract is initialized.","_deposit":"Details for deposit and initial week settings."}},"getCurrentContractId()":{"returns":{"_0":"The current contract ID."}},"getWeeksCount(uint256)":{"params":{"_contractId":"The contract ID for which to retrieve the week count."},"returns":{"_0":"The number of weeks associated with the given contract ID."}},"initialize(address,address,address)":{"params":{"_adminManager":"Address of the adminManager contract of the escrow platform.","_client":"Address of the client initiating actions within the escrow.","_registry":"Address of the registry contract."}},"isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes)":{"params":{"_hash":"Hash of the data to be signed.","_signature":"Signature byte array associated with the hash."},"returns":{"_0":"The magic value if the signature is valid, otherwise 0xffffffff."}},"refill(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"details":"Allows adding additional funds either to the contract's prepayment or to a specific week's payment amount.","params":{"_amount":"The additional amount to be added.","_contractId":"ID of the contract for which the refill is done.","_type":"The type of refill, either prepayment or week payment.","_weekId":"ID of the week within the contract to be refilled, only used if _type is WeekPayment."}},"requestReturn(uint256)":{"details":"The contract must be in an eligible state to request a return (not in disputed or already returned status).","params":{"_contractId":"ID of the deposit for which the return is requested."}},"resolveDispute(uint256,uint256,uint8,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Handles the resolution of disputes by assigning the funds according to the outcome of the dispute.     Admin intervention is required to resolve disputes to ensure fairness.","params":{"_clientAmount":"Amount to be allocated to the client if Split or Client wins.","_contractId":"ID of the contract where the dispute occurred.","_contractorAmount":"Amount to be allocated to the contractor if Split or Contractor wins. This function ensures that the total resolution amounts do not exceed the deposited amount and adjusts the status of the contract based on the dispute outcome.","_weekId":"ID of the contract where the dispute occurred.","_winner":"Specifies who the winner is: Client, Contractor, or Split."}},"transferClientOwnership(address)":{"details":"Can only be called by the account recovery module registered in the system.","params":{"_newAccount":"The address to which the client ownership will be transferred."}},"transferContractorOwnership(uint256,address)":{"details":"Can only be called by the account recovery module registered in the system.","params":{"_contractId":"The identifier of the contract for which contractor ownership is being transferred.","_newAccount":"The address to which the 24fd85208508656164f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f66a271b4ebee7032c91876874f54773a35955249b912621c7321502a365d417","dweb:/ipfs/QmVkYb24oB8BKCebkrQG6eNubX55eUDsyFF7vNTepFjLPi"]},"src/EscrowHourly.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe8eee09e3ec2b42bd6f6cd8db502834c0fe0cac07ff3fd1cb8a40c9277c28684","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d9ab989d0521cb8d2d40e9e339c3e6f8ba385f5064756c3b78f1da0a816a815e","dweb:/ipfs/Qmbmb2GUhv55V3QGtpSdaCmQ876mXmZ1N3phv1jEW4juCj"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrow.sol":{"keccak256":"0x280ce3ecb12e30b495417535ced2579877a7db7fed91bf83534869657a36ae0a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a016b34ecbe4dc1fb695742e4fc92b4db188a3875c2fc9e7756a3a3bbe93da99","dweb:/ipfs/QmeyC29MGt64YPNBRMafbTag4JJQNTePX4tBrcNiJF4Nf8"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrowAdminManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5064f56587166c48dbfdf278f1e86d70576812a67ac21ac7b9404ea17cca9ce5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1cccfcc7c21277cbbb31c6fa7441739e6236d00b6e85ce283550582946e6a8f6","dweb:/ipfs/QmXWUZMCa1AjXJcmc9nCTfNEppGeErG2JoXywVd6CknySG"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrowFeeManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa45d25f162cc477514d568ea15373a10cc72b6adf4b8ae8c32db3a3aefc59fb9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5b0a124af72952549d6b073bec0b42d1fa4a271b15dec3cc31e582ee11cf382a","dweb:/ipfs/QmeruJheWkboppnSPQMiXSgzaGamD7NKRo7yMJP9x9asfk"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrowHourly.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe00a69ff49c9b3772e9cfdcb03b5d4dfd69f1c1da06d797b15066e8ef838fdeb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d05ca5242e5b335439d42342a9fc3f44269cda8657f6bdc630c5266f3130b91a","dweb:/ipfs/QmfLLf881UPdAYcFqwHmfsYnEsXHKW6t28ssNAP4qZmLwM"]},"src/interfaces/IEscrowRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd8246f3f31f806e9433c066c51fb494143060bcfe48715365c0161d8535a543d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://635efc148c6c750fbd0567719ef035cc7b405877f9ba228ce8ffd8ef5694e735","dweb:/ipfs/QmTK9D8kswEWieHQ151TNbSidpMzbGTFFDRHMAtf53Lr4H"]},"src/libs/ERC1271.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb92415a8c6d00741ab2b05ae6c81ede55a1b5aaeb5db41097a026e017b9889fa","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6740580ed8e1ff26b0ce72b954e1aca9b1e025795a9f6e4223c2c7e6942741a5","dweb:/ipfs/QmQpSBYwxDRuDQKtYiDnW1TxnppoDw5BUW4ERHDQKEwh1s"]},"src/libs/Enums.sol":{"keccak256":"0x702d845d8c5664f8a656cf0677f79938eac88efb07ccd8de2049d1e5ca4ba48a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8b61afd54090312927f91eeabfb447ee9554842bf9adee1463e5b76e01531221","dweb:/ipfs/QmXYEcPQDx43E47Vq17XguwsYXpGdTosYpDjjSTjz7Yjop"]}},"version":1}

adminApprove(uint256,uint256,uint256,add.details: This function handles both regular approval within existing weeks and admin-triggered approvals that may     need to create a new week.

params._amountApprove: Amount to approve or initialize the week with.
params._contractId: ID of the contract for which the approval is happening.
params._initializeNewWeek: If true, will initialize a new week if the specified weekId doesn't exist.
params._receiver: Address of the contractor receiving the approved amount.
params._weekId: ID of the week within the contract to be approved, or creates a new one if it does not exist.

approve(uint256,uint256,uint256,address).details: This function allows the client to approve a deposit, specifying the amount to approve.

params._amountApprove: Amount to approve for the deposit.
params._contractId: ID of the deposit to be approved.
params._receiver: Address of the contractor receiving the approved amount.
params._weekId: ID of the week within the contract to be approved.

approveReturn(uint256).details: This changes the status of the deposit to allow the client to withdraw their funds.

params._contractId: ID of the deposit for which the return is approved.

cancelReturn(uint256,uint8).details: Allows reverting the contract status from RETURN_REQUESTED to an active state.

params._contractId: The unique identifier of the contract for which the return is cancelled.
params._status: The new status to set for the contract, must be either ACTIVE or APPROVED or COMPLETED.

claim(uint256,uint256).details: This function allows the contractor to claim the approved amount from the deposit.

params._contractId: ID of the deposit from which to claim funds.
params._weekId: ID of the week within the contract to be claimed.

claimAll(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: This function is designed to prevent running out of gas when claiming multiple weeks by limiting the range.

params._contractId: ID of the contract for which the claim is made.
params._endWeekId: Ending week ID until which claims are made.
params._startWeekId: Starting week ID from which to begin claims.

createDispute(uint256,uint256).details: Initiates a dispute status for a contract that can be activated by the client or contractor     when they disagree on the previously submitted work.

params._contractId: ID of the contract where the dispute occurred.
params._weekId: ID of the contract where the dispute occurred. This function can only be called if the contract status is either RETURN_REQUESTED or SUBMITTED.

deposit(uint256,(address,address,uint256.details: This function handles the initialization or update of a week's deposit in a single transaction.      If a new contract ID is provided, a new contract is initialized; otherwise, it adds to an existing contract.

params._contractId: ID of the contract for which the deposit is made; if zero, a new contract is initialized.
params._deposit: Details for deposit and initial week settings.

params._contractId: The contract ID for which to retrieve the week count.

returns._0: The number of weeks associated with the given contract ID.

params._adminManager: Address of the adminManager contract of the escrow platform.
params._client: Address of the client initiating actions within the escrow.

params._hash: Hash of the data to be signed.
params._signature: Signature byte array associated with the hash.

returns._0: The magic value if the signature is valid, otherwise 0xffffffff.

refill(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8).details: Allows adding additional funds either to the contract's prepayment or to a specific week's payment amount.

params._amount: The additional amount to be added.
params._contractId: ID of the contract for which the refill is done.
params._type: The type of refill, either prepayment or week payment.
params._weekId: ID of the week within the contract to be refilled, only used if _type is WeekPayment.

requestReturn(uint256).details: The contract must be in an eligible state to request a return (not in disputed or already returned status).

params._contractId: ID of the deposit for which the return is requested.

resolveDispute(uint256,uint256,uint8,uin.details: Handles the resolution of disputes by assigning the funds according to the outcome of the dispute.     Admin intervention is required to resolve disputes to ensure fairness.

params._clientAmount: Amount to be allocated to the client if Split or Client wins.
params._contractId: ID of the contract where the dispute occurred.
params._contractorAmount: Amount to be allocated to the contractor if Split or Contractor wins. This function ensures that the total resolution amounts do not exceed the deposited amount and adjusts the status of the contract based on the dispute outcome.
params._weekId: ID of the contract where the dispute occurred.
params._winner: Specifies who the winner is: Client, Contractor, or Split.

transferClientOwnership(address).details: Can only be called by the account recovery module registered in the system.

params._newAccount: The address to which the client ownership will be transferred.

transferContractorOwnership(uint256,addr.details: Can only be called by the account recovery module registered in the system.

params._contractId: The identifier of the contract for which contractor ownership is being transferred.
params._newAccount: The address to which the contractor ownership will be transferred.

updateAdminManager(address).details: Restricts the function to be callable only by the current owner of the admin manager.

params._adminManager: The new address of the admin manager contract.

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraws from the contract's prepayment amount when certain conditions about the contract's     overall status are met.

params._contractId: ID of the deposit from which funds are to be withdrawn.

adminApprove(uint256,uint256,uint256,add.notice: Approves an existing deposit or creates a new week for approval by the admin.

approve(uint256,uint256,uint256,address).notice: Approves a deposit by the client.

approveReturn(uint256).notice: Approves the return of funds, which can be called by the contractor or platform admin.

cancelReturn(uint256,uint8).notice: Cancels a previously requested return and resets the contract's status.

claim(uint256,uint256).notice: Claims the approved amount by the contractor.

claimAll(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Allows the contractor to claim for multiple weeks in a specified range if those weeks are approved.

createDispute(uint256,uint256).notice: Creates a dispute over a specific contract.

deposit(uint256,(address,address,uint256.notice: Creates or updates a week's deposit for a new or existing contract.

getWeeksCount(uint256).notice: Retrieves the number of weeks for a given contract ID.

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: Returns whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data.

refill(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Refills the prepayment or a specific week's deposit with an additional amount.

requestReturn(uint256).notice: Requests the return of funds by the client for a specific contract.

resolveDispute(uint256,uint256,uint8,uin.notice: Resolves a dispute over a specific contract.

transferClientOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the client account to a new account.

transferContractorOwnership(uint256,addr.notice: Transfers ownership of the contractor account to a new account for a specified contract.

updateAdminManager(address).notice: Updates the address of the admin manager contract.

updateRegistry(address).notice: Updates the registry address used for fetching escrow implementations.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws funds from a contract under specific conditions.

documentation.text:
@title Weekly Billing and Payment Management for Escrow Hourly
 @notice Manages the creation and addition of multiple weekly bills to escrow contracts.
